name: Vac-Attack
description:
Windows Only

Vac Attack is a 3D Wave-based FPS where you fight through waves by sucking objects into a vacuum and shoot them at enemies. After each wave, you may unlock new skills with EXP and buy items with Gold.

This is a project I made over the course of December through a friend's "Game Devember" challenge. I had to create a game starting December 1st, implement 1 feature every day, and release the game on January 1st.

It was a very fun project to take part in! It of course had its series of bumps, so while the game isn't perfect, I am proud of the outcome!

SFX and Enemy models/animations are from the Unreal Asset Store. All other models and music are made by me.

I hope you enjoy!!

(Any feedback on the game is greatly appreciated!)

I will soon post a postmortem of my process here for those to read if interested.
